title: Kyou no 5 no 2 (TV): Takarabako
opening_song: "Kitakaze (キタカゼ)" by Friends: Yuu Kobayashi, Asami Shimoda, MAKO, Satomi Akesaka, Youko Honda, Kana Asumi
ending_song: #1: "Daibakuhatsu NO.1 「大爆発 NO.1」" by Friends: Yuu Kobayashi, Asami Shimoda, MAKO, Satomi Akesaka, Youko Honda, Kana Asumi (ep 1)
sinopse: An OVA bundled with the limited edition of the tankobon of the Kyou no Go no Ni manga. The staff and the cast of the OVA are the same as those of the Kyou no Go no Ni TV anime.
